testUtterance: To test dla głosów polskich, mający na celu określenie, który głos brzmi lepiej od pozostałych.

voices.label: Zofia
voices.name: Microsoft Zofia Online (Natural) - Polish (Poland)
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Edge on desktop. Unlike some of the other voices ranked at the top of that list, it's not available to be installed on Windows yet.

voices.label: Marek
voices.name: Microsoft Marek Online (Natural) - Polish (Poland)
voices.note: This voice is pre-loaded in Edge on desktop. Unlike some of the other voices ranked at the top of that list, it's not available to be installed on Windows yet.

voices.label: Ewa
voices.name: Ewa
voices.note: This voice has three variants. Like all voices that can be installed on Apple devices, it suffers from inconsistent naming due to localization.

voices.label: Zosia
voices.name: Zosia
voices.note: This voice is preloaded on all Apple devices and offers two variants. Like all voices that can be installed on Apple devices, it suffers from inconsistent naming due to localization.

voices.label: Krzysztof
voices.name: Krzysztof
voices.note: This voice has two variants. Like all voices that can be installed on Apple devices, it suffers from inconsistent naming due to localization.

voices.label: Paulina
voices.name: Microsoft Paulina - Polish (Poland)
voices.note: This voices is pre-loaded in Windows 10 and 11. While it's nowhere nearly as good as Microsoft's Natural Voices, it's good to have this voice listed as a fallback

voices.label: Adam
voices.name: Microsoft Adam - Polish (Poland)
voices.note: This voices is pre-loaded in Windows 10 and 11. While it's nowhere nearly as good as Microsoft's Natural Voices, it's good to have this voice listed as a fallback

voices.label: Głos żeński 1
voices.name: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google pl-pl-x-afb-network
voices.note: This pre-loaded voice on ChromeOS is tied to the Android compatibility layer and requires network access for this version, which is very much a requirement for using Chrome OS anyway. Fallbacks to offline variant as well.
altNames: Android Speech Recognition and Synthesis from Google pl-pl-x-afb-local

voices.label: Głos polski
voices.name: polski Polska
voices.note: On Android, voice selection is only supported at a system level and Web Speech API doesn't return a true list of voices available, just a list of languages and regions
